name: Juvenile
description: Underdeveloped frame but high energy. +1 Agility, -1 Strength.

name: Elder
description: Decades of survival. +1 Wisdom, -1 Endurance.

name: In Prime
description: Peak physical condition. No inherent penalties.

name: Hardy
description: A rugged constitution that refuses to break. +15 Max HP.

name: Expert Scrapper
description: You know where the high-grade components are hidden. +25% Parts found.

name: Field Medic
description: Basic anatomy knowledge is a rarity. Medicine is 50% more effective.

name: Streetwise
description: You speak the language of the low-life. Rumors you hear are 20% more likely to be accurate.

name: Lead Foot
description: You can squeeze every drop of torque out of a rusted engine. -10% Fuel cost for travel.

name: Vigilant
description: You sleep with one eye open. -50% Chance of being ambushed during Nightfall.

name: Nimble
description: Quick reflexes honed by dodging falling debris. +10% Evasion in combat.

name: Pre-Ash Scholar
description: You can actually read the old manuals. +15% XP Gain.

name: Stout
description: Broad shoulders meant for heavy lifting. +20% Inventory capacity.

name: Survivalist
description: You can make a feast out of a handful of dirt. -20% Daily resource consumption.

name: Marksman
description: Steady hands and a cold heart. +10% Accuracy with ranged weapons.

name: Master Tinker
description: You can fix a radiator with a gum wrapper. Repair actions cost 50% less Parts.

name: Keen Sight
description: Exceptional visual acuity. Easier to spot distant POIs.

name: Thick Skinned
description: Less likely to bleed from minor wounds and environment hazards.

name: Iron Gut
description: Massive resistance to food poisoning and radiation sickness from water.

name: Lucky
description: Small chance for critical failures to be ignored or loot to be doubled.

name: Silver Tongue
description: Charisma that works even in the Ash. Better rates with all traders.

name: Bushwhacker
description: Deals 20% extra damage when initiating combat from stealth.

name: Pathfinder
description: Instinct for forgotten routes. Travel encounters are 25% less likely, and map discovery range is increased.

name: Scavenger's Instinct
description: Knows where to dig. Containers have a small chance to yield rare materials.

name: Crisis Manager
description: Remains calm under pressure. Party morale drops 30% slower during emergencies.

name: Ghost Walker
description: Moves like drifting ash. Stealth actions generate 20% less Heat.

name: Quartermaster
description: Inventory is war. Supplies spoil 50% slower and stack more efficiently.

name: Battlefield Surgeon
description: Improvised surgery expert. Healing in combat restores 20% more HP.

name: Salvage Engineer
description: Nothing is truly broken. Destroyed equipment yields extra parts.

name: Negotiator
description: Always finds common ground. Conflict events have a chance to be resolved peacefully.

name: Frail
description: A weak frame plagued by old injuries. -15 Max HP.

name: Anemic
description: Wounds take a long time to clot. Bleeding effects last twice as long.

name: Chem-Reliant
description: The Ash is too much to bear sober. Morale drops 2x faster if Meds are empty.

name: Heavy Stepper
description: You lack the grace for subtlety. Increases Heat generated by actions by 15%.

name: Jittery
description: The constant hum of the Dead Zone gets to you. -10% Ranged accuracy.

name: Sentimental Hoarder
description: You can't bear to leave anything behind. Inventory weight increases by 15%.

name: Night Blind
description: Your eyes never adjusted to the dark. Heavy penalties to all actions during Nightfall.

name: Deaf
description: Cannot hear sounds. Massive penalty to surprise attacks and noise detection.

name: Limper
description: A permanent leg injury. 20% slower travel speed on foot.

name: Ash-Lung
description: A chronic, rattling cough that can alert nearby hostiles.

name: Cowardly
description: Quickly becomes panicked when HP drops below 40%.

name: Clumsy
description: 10% chance to fail complex manual tasks and waste resources.

name: Pacifist
description: You hate the sight of blood. -20% Melee damage.

name: Paranoid
description: Trusts no one. Crew Trust decays slowly over time.

name: Fragile Mind
description: Nightmares of the old world. Morale recovers 40% slower.

name: Rust Allergy
description: Chemical sensitivity. Using damaged equipment sometimes causes HP loss.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Obsessive focus. Misses secondary objectives more often.

name: Reckless Loader
description: Careless with supplies. Ammo and tools are consumed 15% faster.

name: Nomadic Restlessness
description: Cannot stay still. Penalties when remaining too long in one settlement.

name: Static Whispers
description: Hears voices in radio static. Random morale fluctuations.

name: Brittle Bones
description: Old fractures never healed. Takes extra damage from falls and impacts.

name: Wasteland Nomad
description: The road is your only home. +1 Agility while traveling, -1 Wisdom while in settlements.

name: Former Urbanite
description: You miss the concrete jungle. +1 Wisdom in settlements, -1 Endurance on the road.

name: Mercenary Heart
description: Loyalty is bought, not earned. +10 Morale when Resources are high, -10 Trust from crew.

name: Static Zealot
description: You hear god in the white noise. Immune to Fear effects, -10% XP Gain.

name: Selfless Martyr
description: You’d die for the group. +10 Crew Morale when you take damage, but you lose 2x more Morale when resting.

name: Cold Pragmatist
description: Utility above all. +5% Trade efficiency, -1 Charisma.

name: Reckless Daredevil
description: Danger is the only thing that makes you feel alive. +10% Crit chance, +10% Damage received.

name: Stoic Outcast
description: The world broke you long ago. Immune to Morale shifts (positive or negative).

name: Bitter Cynic
description: You’ve seen it all before. +1 Intelligence, -10% Trust gain with new crew members.

name: Solitary Hermit
description: Company is a curse. +1 Endurance when solo, -1 Agility when in a crew.

name: Talkative
description: Enjoys socializing with crew. Boosts others morale slightly, but uses 10% more water.

name: Rad-Scars
description: Obvious physical mutations. Intimidates enemies, but traders are more wary of you.

name: Mysterious
description: Rarely shares details. Harder for enemies to read you, but crew trust grows slowly.

name: Perfectionist
description: Diligent and precise. Better crafting quality, but tasks take 25% longer.

name: Superstitious
description: Avoids "cursed" ruins. Randomly refuses certain dangerous actions.

name: Nocturnal
description: Alert at night, sluggish by day. Inverts the standard Day/Night penalties.

name: Curious
description: Driven to investigate. Reveals POIs easier, but generates more Heat.

name: Optimist
description: Finds hope in ash. Higher Morale floor, but takes longer to realize a situation is fatal.

name: Nostalgic
description: Collects Old World relics. High sanity, but easily distracted in ruins.

name: Chronicler
description: Documents everything. Extra lore and journal entries, slight XP bonus from discoveries.

name: Lone Strategist
description: Plans better alone. Tactical bonuses when separated from crew.

name: Ash-Born
description: Adapted to toxic zones. Radiation resistance increased, but normal zones feel dull.

name: Relic Seeker
description: Obsessed with Old World tech. Special POIs appear more often.

name: Ritualist
description: Performs daily rites. Minor morale buff if routines are respected.

name: Crowd Chameleon
description: Blends into any group. Reduced penalties in hostile settlements.

name: Risk Accountant
description: Calculates odds constantly. Crit chance and failure chance both slightly increased.

name: Bonded Companion
description: Forms strong attachment. Gains buffs near one specific crew member, heavy debuff if separated.
